name: New Jewel Ultimate
description:
New Jewel Ultimate is a best free addictive puzzle and casual game relaxing and entertaining game for all ages.
How to play
- Swap and Match 3 Jewels in a line to remove them.
- Match 4 Jewels can win the jewels bomb and 1 lighting.
- Match 5 jewels to win color-changing jewels and 2 lighting.
- The timing bonus can extend the playing time.
- More than 300 challenging levels.
- It's really challenge to get 3 stars in each level!
